# CoreSpotlightActionIdentifier

**Property List Key**

A string an app defines to identify the action.

## Discussion

Core Spotlight includes the value of this key in the `userInfo` dictionary of the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSUserActivity] when it invokes the app.

## Action Properties

- **CoreSpotlightActionTitle**: The user-visible string that Spotlight displays as the title of the action.
- **CoreSpotlightActionSymbolImage**: The name of a SF Symbol to display next to the action’s title.
